intro: Argostemma ebracteolatum, commonly known as the slender argostemma, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, herbaceous stems and opposite, ovate leaves that are often hairy. The plant produces small, clustered flowers with five petals, typically in shades of white or pale yellow. It is native to tropical regions of Asia and is often found in moist, shaded habitats. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
